prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon with a mischievous expression and glowing eyes.
Show me a dark-type Pokemon that has sharp claws and a playful stance.
Imagine a Pokemon that lurks in caves, with purple skin and bright blue eyes.
Design a bipedal creature that is both spooky and charming, perfect for a nighttime setting.
Generate an eerie Pokemon with a unique combination of dark and ghostly features.
Make a Pokemon that embodies stealth, with a sleek body and shiny accents.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, with a distinct shadowy appearance.
